topic.title: We Need Turkish Forum
topic.body: Hi everyone, I'm from Turkey and this is my first post. I did some research and I really surprised how zeronet works. There is less community but efficient. Maybe we can open Turkish forum also. It will be great. Bcs our country seems a bit governed by a monarchy. Even it's not certain but netflix could even be shut down anytime soon. There are rumors that way. I'm sure if I could share this place with more people, we'd be a huge community.

1595245747_1H957LnCvbdc8nSN3j4miBMMNH2aw.body:
> [dirt3009](#comment_1_1Mg2131yJmaaatA1GuB3CmNXefjPe9ixni): new passed internet laws seem pretty dangerous to me.bumping this

absolutely, they take free speech right when they want. Most of my friend stop tweeting about government and political issues.
